overview:
Bhanu Choudhrie, investor, business owner and specialist in emerging markets such as China and India was born in Delhi in 1978. He studied International Business and Marketing at the University of Boston and later moved to London where he now resides today with is wife.

Mr. Choudhrie has been the executive director of C&C Alpha Group Ltd (CCAG) since 2001 and the group has a vast portfolio of investments, from luxury award-winning spa hotels in India and Mauritius to care homes in the UK. In addition to his business ventures, Mr. Choudhrie also pursues many philanthropic causes and is a liberal donor to charities around the world.

Bhanu Choudhrie was Entrepreneur of the Year at the Asian Voice Political and Public Life Awards in 2008.
